values.description: Least-privilege app policy (S3 + Secrets Manager optional)
values.name: app-dev-app-policy

values.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
values.name: app-dev-vpce-sg

after.description: Least-privilege app policy (S3 + Secrets Manager optional)
after.name: app-dev-app-policy

after.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
after.name: app-dev-vpce-sg

db_secret_arn.description: Secrets Manager secret ARN containing DB connection info (if enabled)

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL (push your app image here)

description.constant_value: Least-privilege app policy (S3 + Secrets Manager optional)
Security group for interface VPC endpoints

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

container_image.description: Container image to run. Use an ECR image URI or public image.

container_port.description: Port your application container listens on.

db_skip_final_snapshot.description: Skip final snapshot on destroy (dev only).

db_username.description: RDS master username (password is generated and stored in Secrets Manager).

domain_name.description: FQDN for the application (e.g., app.example.com). Required if enable_https=true.

enable_https.description: If true, create HTTPS listener and ACM cert (requires domain_name + hosted_zone_id).

enable_rds.description: If true, create an RDS PostgreSQL instance (private).

enable_s3.description: If true, create an S3 bucket for object storage.

enable_vpc_endpoints.description: If true, create VPC endpoints for S3 and common ECS dependencies.

health_check_path.description: HTTP path for ALB health checks.

hosted_zone_id.description: Route53 hosted zone id for domain_name. Required if enable_https=true.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.
